Feat.Name: Improved Disarm
Feat.Description: You are skilled at knocking weapons from a foe's grasp.
Feat.Benefit: You do not provoke an attack of opportunity when performing a disarm combat maneuver. In addition, you receive a +2 bonus on checks made to disarm a foe. You also receive a +2 bonus to your Combat Maneuver Defense whenever an opponent tries to disarm you.
